name: Big Larry
description:
BIG LARRY is a single player survival/thriller horror game, packed with immersive content! Play as a deliquent high school student leaving late from detention, when your friend asks for a favor. He’s lucky you’re still at school. Unfortunately, this gets you trapped with something dangerous… Look out for clues, pick up items, solve puzzles, check lockers and make a break for the exit when you get the chance!

Creek High

Creek High has become a nightmare of a school ever since the school mascot BIG LARRY was found dead. The kids say its a myth but your about to put that myth to a test when your friend sends you on a mission durring a stormy night..


Heart Pumping Content

  • Solve Puzzles
  • Break Into Classrooms
  • Smash Your Way Out



Stay quiet.. stay alert and DO NOT DISTURB the angry school mascot!
